 2000-10492000-06-260,  ,  ,  TB,  HERITAGE, 
PrecisApproval for the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION (a) to sell some 4,898 square metres of land situate at 263 and 303 Mutual Street in Toronto, Ontario, to CONTEXT REAL ESTATE INC., and (b) to convey another 4,970 square metres of land situate at 354 and 372 Jarvis Street in Toronto, to the NATIONAL BALLET SCHOOL, for a nominal sum.
